aws_appmesh_mesh.description: Provides an AWS App Mesh service mesh resource.

name.description: The name to use for the service mesh.

spec.description: The service mesh specification to apply.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

egress_filter.description: The egress filter rules for the service mesh.

type.description: The egress filter type. By default, the type is `DROP_ALL`.

id.description: The ID of the service mesh.

arn.description: The ARN of the service mesh.

created_date.description: The creation date of the service mesh.

last_updated_date.description: The last update date of the service mesh.
